options.explain: When attacking, increase Damage Value by +7627 for 60 seconds.
options.explainDetail: When attacking, increase Damage Value by +7627 for 60 seconds (Max 1 stack).

fixedOption.explain:
Advanced Attack skills add Technical Points. (Up to 20 points)
- Lv. 1 - 30: 1 pt.
- Lv. 35 - 45: 2 pts.
- Lv. 60 - 80: 2 pts.
- Lv. 50/85/95: 5 pts.
- Lv. 100: 10 pts.
- Chain Connection Chain/Aerial Skill Use: 1 pt.

Activates the following, depending on your Technical Points.
- 11 pts. or more: All skills' remaining cooldown -30% on Lv. 50/85/100 skill hits (Awakening skills excluded. All points consumed.)
- 6 pts. or more: Failed Advanced Skill attacks decrease that skill's cooldown to 3 sec. (3 pts. consumed)
- 1 pt. or more: Chain Connection skill combos decrease Chain Connection recovery -3 sec.
fixedOption.explainDetail:
Advanced Attack skills add Technical Points. (Up to 20 points)
- Lv. 1 - 30: 1 pt.
- Lv. 35 - 45: 2 pts.
- Lv. 60 - 80: 2 pts.
- Lv. 50/85/95: 5 pts.
- Lv. 100: 10 pts.
- Chain Connection Chain/Aerial Skill Use: 1 pt.

Activates the following, depending on your Technical Points.
- 11 pts. or more: All skills' remaining cooldown -30% on Lv. 50/85/100 skill hits (Awakening skills excluded. All points consumed.)
- 6 pts. or more: Failed Advanced Skill attacks decrease that skill's cooldown to 3 sec. (3 pts. consumed)
- 1 pt. or more: Chain Connection skill combos decrease Chain Connection recovery -3 sec.

[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).

fixedOption.explain:
Overall Damage +2%
Fire Damage +20

Atk. Increase +286.0% for every Burned target (Max Stacks: 5)

[Fire Force]
Attacks deliver Fire attacks, depending on your Fire Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150: Explosion
- 150 to below 250: Infernal Road
- 250 or more: Meteor
- Inflicts 720, 920, or 1,480% of total Atk. Increase, respectively.
- Meteor Burns enemies for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)

Attack Speed +10%
Casting Speed +15%
Fire Resistance +20
